metadata.name: PCGI_EQ
metadata.description:
PCGI_EQ is a 24 hour OE, with 100% of mint proceeds going to those affected by the devastating earthquakes in Turkey and Syria.

As a Turkish engineer//NFT creator, Iâ€™m horrified by the scenes unfolding on our southern border and ask my community to contribute anything they can to support this cause - minting even just 10 of the OE can help provide shelter for a family affected by the disasters

24 hours after mint closes, all transaction details will be posted to Twitter for verification by the community. See [https://twitter.com/perpetual_cgi] for more info.
